changeSet.author: jdavid
changeSet.comment: Add femalePanel column into the Panel table
changeSet.sql: alter table `prodlims`.`panel` add column `female_panel` bit(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT b'0';

changeSet.author: jdavid
changeSet.comment: Set female_panel value to true for female panels
changeSet.sql: update `prodlims`.`panel` set `female_panel` = true where name in ('FRAX_F', 'FRAX_F_B', 'CS_FRAX_F', 'DMD_F', 'DMD_F_B');
changeSet.rollback: update `prodlims`.`panel` set `female_panel` = false where name in ('FRAX_F', 'FRAX_F_B', 'CS_FRAX_F', 'DMD_F', 'DMD_F_B');
